price: 156. Usun Nabii Qiisal koroositeeniih kay ina Maryam dalwa Abte Axcuk kaxxa ererih edde yeerren maxco iyyeenimih Sabbatah Ni- Racmatak ken Neyxeereh.
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
